text:
ISBN-13: 9780446578424.
ISBN-10: 0446578428.
Title: The Serial Killers Club.
Subtitle: A Novel.
Authors: Jeff Povey.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=3ZBmlwEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Killing a serial murderer while defending himself against an attack on his life, a man inadvertently enters an exclusive club of murderers who address one another with celebrity names and share a mutual love of "the hunt," an organization that the protagonist decides to stop by systematically killing off its members..
Published Year: 2006.
